Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board

Class ProfessorSet

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.ProfessorSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ProfessorSet extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains the Professors and offers useful methods to retrieve the right professor or change their ownership.

      color - the color of the professor to access

    • getNumberOfProfessors

      public int getNumberOfProfessors(TowerColor towerColor)
      Method for calculating the number of professor that a given team possesses.
      Parameters:
      towerColor - the tower color of the given team
      Returns:
      the number of professors owned by the members of the team

    • determineStrongestPlayer

      public Player determineStrongestPlayer(Player player1, Player player2)
      Determines the player who holds the most professors.
      Parameters:
      player1 - the first player to compare.
      player2 - the second player to compare.
      Returns:
      the player who holds the most professors, null if both have the same number of professors.

    • getProfessorsOwner

      public HashMap<Color,String> getProfessorsOwner()
      Method to observe which Professor is owned by who
      Returns:
      An HashMap with the color of the professor as Key and its owner as Object (null if no player owns it)
